languages.text: {n}Плитки в руках Джай вам знакомы — это набор для тан-то-ло, азартной игры на счет. Каждый игрок получает вслепую несколько плиток, которые при помощи хитрого сплетения маг-линий складываются в узор определенного достоинства. У кого узор дороже, тот и побеждает. В эту игру любят резаться пустотники, и выигрывают в тан-то-ло как правило либо удачливые, либо умники.{/n}

{n}You recognise the tiles in Jae's hand — it is a set for tan-to-lo, a game popular among gamblers. Each player is dealt several tiles, which can be arranged into a pattern of a specific value by carefully matching up the mag-lines. Whoever has the highest value wins. Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你认出了婕伊手中的牌，那是一副坦塔卢牌，这种牌在赌徒之间非常流行。每个玩家刚开始的时候都会拿到几张牌，玩家可以通过匹配牌上的磁线，组成特定的图案。不同的图案得分不同，最后谁分数最高，谁就赢了。这种牌需要靠运气和技巧取胜，在船员之中非常流行。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the tiles in Jae's hand — it is a set for tan-to-lo, a game popular among gamblers. Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはジェイの手にあるタイルに見覚えがあった…それはギャンブラーの間で人気のゲーム、タン・トゥー・ローのセットだ。各プレイヤーにはいくつかのタイルが配られ、マグラインを注意深く合わせることで特定の価値のパターンを作り上げる。そして、最も高い値を持つ者が勝つというゲームだ。宇宙船乗りはタン・ツー・ロが大好きで、その勝敗は運か腕で分たれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the tiles in Jae's hand — it is a set for tan-to-lo, a game popular among gamblers. Each player is dealt several tiles, which can be arranged into a pattern of a specific value by carefully matching up the mag-lines. Whoever has the highest value wins. Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reconoces las fichas de la mano de Jae. Pertenecen a un juego popular entre tahúres, llamado tan-to-lo. Cada jugador recibe una serie de fichas que puede organizar para formar un diseño con cierto valor en puntos haciendo que las líneas magnéticas coincidan. El que más puntos tenga gana. Los marineros del vacío son grandes aficionados al tan-to-lo, en el que la suerte y la habilidad son claves para la victoria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the tiles in Jae's hand — it is a set for tan-to-lo, a game popular among gamblers. Each player is dealt several tiles, which can be arranged into a pattern of a specific value by carefully matching up the mag-lines. Whoever has the highest value wins. Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

Los marineros del vacío son grandes aficionados al tan-to-lo, en el que la suerte y la habilidad son claves para la victoria.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous reconnaissez les tuiles dans la main de Jae : on s'en sert pour jouer au tan-to-lo, un jeu populaire chez les parieurs. Chaque joueur reçoit plusieurs tuiles qu'il doit ensuite disposer de façon à former un motif en arrangeant les lignes magnétiques. L'alignement ainsi créé rapporte des points, et le score le plus élevé l'emporte. Les cosmomarins raffolent du tan-to-lo, ce jeu mêlant aussi bien la chance que le talent.{/n}

Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst die Spielsteine in Jaes Hand – sie gehören zu Tan-to-Lo, einem beliebten Spiel unter Glücksspielern. Jeder Spieler bekommt mehrere Steine, die dann sorgfältig aneinandergelegt werden müssen, um die Mag-Linien auf ihnen zu einem Muster mit einem bestimmten Wert anzuordnen. Wer den höchsten Wert hat, gewinnt. Raumfahrer lieben Tan-to-Lo, das in der Regel durch Glück oder Geschick gewonnen wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the tiles in Jae's hand — it is a set for tan-to-lo, a game popular among gamblers. Each player is dealt several tiles, which can be arranged into a pattern of a specific value by carefully matching up the mag-lines. Whoever has the highest value wins. Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın elindeki karolara aşinasın. Bu bir tan-to-lo seti. Kumarbazlar arasında popüler bir oyundur. Her oyuncuya birkaç karo dağıtılır ve bunlar mıknatıslı çizgiler dikkatle eşleştirilerek, belli bir değere sahip olacak şekilde düzenlenir. En yüksek değeri elinde bulunduran da kazanır. Şansla veya yetenekle kazanılabilir. Uçsuz erleri bu oyunu çok sever.{/n}

Voidsmen love playing tan-to-lo, which is usually won by luck or skill.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın elindeki karolara aşinasın. Bu bir tan-to-lo seti. Kumarbazlar arasında popüler bir oyun. Her oyuncuya birkaç karo dağıtılır ve bunlar mıknatıslı çizgiler dikkatle eşleştirilerek, belli bir değere sahip olacak şekilde düzenlenir. En yüksek değere sahip olan da kazanır. Şans eseri veya yetenekle kazanılabilir. Uçsuz erlerinin sevdiği bir oyundur.{/n}
